title: Reflective Learning Design Competency Development Program for English Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English teaching methodologies and classroom management experience
context.additional_context: Reflective planning method training using smartphone-accessible VR simulation tools; enhancing English lesson design competencies to flexibly respond to curriculum changes

learning_goals: Learners can execute three or more reflective planning strategies to reach the ‘Proficient’ stage of the Dreyfus model’s five levels
Learners can perform two or more English lesson simulations in a real VR environment and write self-assessment reports
Learners can demonstrate the process of improving one or more lesson design plans by incorporating peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
